comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: "William Franklin "Birdie" Cree (October 23, 1882 – November 8, 1942) was a Major League Baseball outfielder. He spent his entire 8-year career (1908-1915) with the New York Highlanders, which would become the New York Yankees." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Birdie_Cree

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
artolog,

Thanks for the more complete name and life dates for Mr. Cree. We will add those to the record.
